review: Tf2 is a fun and enjoable game it gives u options what to do on it Play the game or trade i like to do both but mostly trading.

This game is really awesome, it brings what a videogame needs Intesity,challenge and etertainment. I really recommend this game to gamers who enjoy coming together with their friends and having adventures with them especially with all the different characters you can get!! Awesome Game
